history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER Pittsburgh Airport
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER CMU
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie-mellon university?
USER Yes.
TTS When do you want to travel
USER Morrow at 8 p.m.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to morrow park city apartments?
USER No.
TTS Where are you going?
USER Pittsburgh Airport
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:14 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 32 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head south on Tech St toward Frew St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Schenley Drive. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Panther Hollow Rd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the ramp to Boulevard of the Allies. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER repeat
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the ramp to Boulevard of the Allies. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue onto Boulevard of the Allies. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Van Braam St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER repeat
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Van Braam St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight to stay on Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Grant St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the ramp to I-376/Fort Pitt Bridge/Airport. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Merge onto I-376 west. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Keep left to stay on I-376 west. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER alright
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take exit 53 toward Airport. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Continue onto Airport Blvd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No, thank you.
